::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "Allright. I'll have samples for you shortly. Follow me 
to the lab."

Zardus walks out of the conference room, waiting for Lady Hawk to 
follow. His internal computer silently sends a transmission to 
Feline: "Feline, new orders. Get a fast vehicle and search the planet 
for as many DNA samples as you can find. If you meet anyone, return 
to base immediately."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk had thought she had an Ace to play but Zardus had called 
her
> bluff. "DNA from the planet will be sufficient." She was still 
getting what
> she was sent out for, she was just getting the samples in a 
different way.
> The brave royal female only had one more concern, the creatures 
Zardus
> wanted created were eating machines, they had a tendancy to use 
thier
> creator as thier first meal, somehow she had to override that 
instinct with
> a mothers love.
